query:
INSERT INTO decisions (decisionId, type, subject, policyCode, risk, requiredAuthority, status, slaDeadline, amount, beneficiary, context, decidedAt, decidedBy, justification, executionRef, createdAt) VALUES 
('DEC-2024-220', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $145,000 AUD to Meridian Capital', 'PAY-004', 'HIGH', 'SUPERVISOR', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-01 10:30:00', '145000', 'Meridian Capital Partners', '{"amount":145000,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Meridian Capital Partners","purpose":"Invoice payment","reference":"INV-220001","riskSignals":["Velocity check"]}', '2025-12-01 10:15:00', 'Amanda Foster', 'Verified with counterparty.', NULL, '2025-12-01 10:00:00'),
('DEC-2024-221', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $89,750 AUD to Pacific Rim Holdings', 'PAY-004', 'MEDIUM', 'SUPERVISOR', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-02 14:00:00', '89750', 'Pacific Rim Holdings', '{"amount":89750,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Pacific Rim Holdings","purpose":"Trade settlement","reference":"INV-220002","riskSignals":["New counterparty"]}', '2025-12-02 13:45:00', 'Chris Martinez', 'Documentation verified.', NULL, '2025-12-02 13:00:00'),
('DEC-2024-222', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $267,500 AUD to Westfield Property', 'PAY-004', 'CRITICAL', 'DUAL', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-03 09:15:00', '267500', 'Westfield Property Trust', '{"amount":267500,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Westfield Property Trust","purpose":"Capital call","reference":"INV-220003","riskSignals":["Large amount"]}', '2025-12-03 09:00:00', 'Sarah Mitchell', 'Dual control completed.', NULL, '2025-12-03 09:00:00'),
('DEC-2024-223', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $56,890 AUD to Northern Star', 'PAY-004', 'MEDIUM', 'SUPERVISOR', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-04 11:30:00', '56890', 'Northern Star Resources', '{"amount":56890,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Northern Star Resources","purpose":"Dividend","reference":"INV-220004","riskSignals":["Device fingerprint"]}', '2025-12-04 11:15:00', 'James Wong', 'No adverse indicators.', NULL, '2025-12-04 10:30:00'),
('DEC-2024-500', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $189,000 AUD to BHP Group', 'PAY-004', 'HIGH', 'SUPERVISOR', 'EXECUTED', '2025-12-01 15:00:00', '189000', 'BHP Group Limited', '{"amount":189000,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"BHP Group Limited","purpose":"Invoice payment","reference":"INV-500001","riskSignals":["Velocity check"]}', '2025-12-01 14:45:00', 'Emma Thompson', 'Verified and executed.', 'EXE-789456', '2025-12-01 14:30:00'),
('DEC-2024-501', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $345,000 AUD to Rio Tinto', 'PAY-004', 'CRITICAL', 'DUAL', 'EXECUTED', '2025-12-02 16:15:00', '345000', 'Rio Tinto Limited', '{"amount":345000,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Rio Tinto Limited","purpose":"Trade settlement","reference":"INV-500002","riskSignals":["Cross-border"]}', '2025-12-02 16:00:00', 'Michael Chen', 'Dual control completed and executed.', 'EXE-123789', '2025-12-02 16:00:00'),
('DEC-2024-224', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $123,456 AUD to Telstra', 'PAY-004', 'HIGH', 'SUPERVISOR', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-05 10:00:00', '123456', 'Telstra Corporation', '{"amount":123456,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Telstra Corporation","purpose":"Service fee","reference":"INV-220005","riskSignals":["Unusual timing"]}', '2025-12-05 09:45:00', 'Lisa Anderson', 'KYC verified.', NULL, '2025-12-05 09:30:00'),
('DEC-2024-225', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $78,900 AUD to Woolworths', 'PAY-004', 'MEDIUM', 'SUPERVISOR', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-06 13:30:00', '78900', 'Woolworths Group', '{"amount":78900,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Woolworths Group","purpose":"Invoice payment","reference":"INV-220006","riskSignals":["Transaction pattern"]}', '2025-12-06 13:15:00', 'David Kim', 'Transaction confirmed.', NULL, '2025-12-06 12:30:00'),
('DEC-2024-226', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $234,567 AUD to Qantas', 'PAY-004', 'HIGH', 'SUPERVISOR', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-07 09:45:00', '234567', 'Qantas Airways', '{"amount":234567,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Qantas Airways","purpose":"Loan repayment","reference":"INV-220007","riskSignals":["Beneficiary mismatch"]}', '2025-12-07 09:30:00', 'Rachel Green', 'Compliance cleared.', NULL, '2025-12-07 09:15:00'),
('DEC-2024-227', 'LIMIT_OVERRIDE', 'Limit override for Macquarie to $950,000 AUD', 'LIM-002', 'HIGH', 'DUAL', 'APPROVED', '2025-12-08 11:00:00', '950000', 'Macquarie Group', '{"amount":950000,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Macquarie Group","purpose":"Capital call","reference":"LIM-220008","riskSignals":["Unusual activity"]}', '2025-12-08 10:45:00', 'Alex Chen', 'Dual control verified.', NULL, '2025-12-08 10:30:00');
